title: Wi-Fi
description:
Airport travelers that are not customers of our WiFi service provider, or the companies they have reciprocal agreements with can log in for a FREE one-hour session with the option of purchasing additional time.
MacArthur Airport currently has FREE WiFi service for customers of Cablevision's Optimum Online, as well as users of TimeWarner Road Runner, Comcast Infinity and Bright House Internet.

title: Parking
description:
Economy Lot Parking

Economy Parking Rates:
$4 per hour
$14.00 per 24 hours (Maximum Charge)*

Included in the price is a free shuttle to and from the Main Terminal. Shuttle applies only to customers using the Economy Lot.
Economy lot shuttle starts at 4:30 a.m. and makes regular trips to the lot every 15-30 minutes until one hour after the final flight of the evening lands.

More information

title: Rental Cars
description:

List of available car rental agencies

title: Taxis and Public Transportation
description:
Taxis
Located just outside of baggage claim, Village Taxi has an on-site representative to help keep passengers moving from the terminal to the taxi stand. Village Taxi also offers travelers a $5 shuttle ride to the Ronkonkoma station of the Long Island Railroad, which is located just north of MacArthur Airport.

Local Bus Services:
MacArthur Airport has several different bus services available.
Suffolk Bus: Routes throughout Suffolk County.
Suffolk Bus information

7Bus: Luxury Commuter Bus Service between Long Island and NYC.
7Bus information

Hampton Jitney: Luxury Commuter Bus Service between Long Island and Manhattan.
Hampton Jitney information

title: Rail
description:
The Long Island Railroad (LIRR) has one of its main hubs, the Ronkonkoma Station, located just one mile to the north of MacArthur Airport with hourly service to and from New York City. Village Taxi, the on-site Taxi service at MacArthur Airport, also offers travelers a $5 shuttle ride to the Ronkonkoma station of the Long Island Railroad.

More information
